title: Nokia 's net sales 1999 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net sales in billion euros, containing a total of 21 data points.
Overall Net sales in billion euros has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Net sales in billion euros, about 51.06 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Net sales in billion euros about 11.76 was reached at Year 2014
